channel.title: Need Stat Bug Fix (TestScape)
channel.description:
I need a guide or TuT on fixing the stat bug on testscape
here is a pic:
[URL=http://img444.imageshack.us/my.php?image=statsox3.png][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/2994/statsox3.th.png[/img][/URL]
what i need fixed is the 200/99 thing to make it 200/200
help is appreciated :D
EDIT: and yes i have searched the TuT section and came up with nothing.
